experiences.title: Site Reliablity Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Gatestone & Co Inc.
workDescription: Resolve software and hardware malfunctions within external and internal SLAs by utilizing skills in AWS, Windows 2010, Linux, Virtualization and Automation techniques.
Implemented self-serve password reset tool for the entire organization, resulting in a 30% drop in incident volume.
Create Bash scripts for bulk updating user values in IAM.
Maintain cloud infrastructure using AWS services such as EC2, EFS, Auto Scaling, and CloudWatch to meet application performance and scalability requirements.
Work closely with development and other cross-functional teams to support the engineering, implementation, and migration of existing applications to the AWS by providing on-site and on-call support.
Administer Government of Canada applications by resolving access-level issues and ensuring compliance with security policies.
Act as a technical expert to investigate and resolve live site incidents, ensuring recovery and root cause analysis.
Automate ManageEngine for incident management and ticket creation.
Create and maintain detailed technical documentation for processes, tools, and incident resolutions.

experiences.title: Devops Intern
experiences.subtitle: Lallemand Montreal
workDescription: Designed, developed, and maintained Kubernetes platforms, leveraging Helm to ensure efficient container orchestration and scalability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions to automate application deployment workflows, reducing manual intervention for creating Docker images on each push.
Documented operational processes and troubleshooting procedures to support knowledge sharing and team efficiency.

experiences.title: Full stack Developer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Bombardier Inc.
workDescription: Used python (NumPy & Pandas) to extract information out of supplier excel files.
Leveraged Express.js for backend and HTML & CSS for frontend to publish and update process documentation on Bombardiers website.
Used VBA to record and modify excel macros to extact supplier information.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, and SonarQube, reducing deployment time and production malfunctions by following SRE best practices.
